column5: http://www.cpsc.gov/en/Recalls/2015/Rapala-Recalls-StrikeMaster-Ice-Augers/  I saw this and figured maybe it might affect someone that ice fishes.
Whats the hazard? I dont see it mentioned.  Thanks for the heads up!
" Hazard: The trigger switch on the auger could fail and the unit not turn off, posing an injury hazard. "  It is on there, right under recall summary.
My bad, i didnt look at the whole page. Thanks!
I think that's about a year old already.  But better to know than getting wound up with an auger.
